full_summary:
================================
### Solicitation #2023-00692
#### Task-Based Professional Services Human Resources (TSPS HR)

[Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA)](https://inspection.gc.ca/)
#### Publication Date: March 9, 2023
#### Closing Date and Time: March 31, 2023 (15:00:00)

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) is seeking human resource consulting services for the Operations Branch, Ontario Area. The services will encompass tasks related to internal and external competitions.

### Scope of Work

*    Human Resource Services Stream:
    *    HR Consultant
    *    Staffing Consultant
*    Period of Contract: From the contract award date to March 31, 2025
*    Option to Extend: Up to two (2) one-year periods under the same conditions
*    Procurement Type: Competitive - Selective Tendering

### Notes

*    This procurement process is conditionally set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business.
*    The procurement is open to both Indigenous and non-Indigenous businesses.
*    If two or more Indigenous businesses submit a bid, the procurement will be exclusive to Indigenous businesses under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business.

### Related Party

*    Contracting Entity: Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA)
*    Contact Person: Ronald Staigh (ron.staigh@inspection.gc.ca)
*    Address: 1400 Merivale Road, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada

### Proposal Documents

The tender notice and proposal package are available on the Government of Canada's ATN (Autorité des Marchés Publics) website.

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is covered under the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Regions Covered

This procurement is open to businesses operating within the Ontario region, excluding the National Capital Region.

*   Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region)
